name: HepatitisB
title: Hepatitis B
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contain codes commonly used to identify patients with acute or chronic Hepatitis B infection.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is identify patients with acute or chronic Hepatitis B infection.  Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element would map to the "Diagnosis, Active" or "Diagnosis, Inactive" element.),(Inclusion Criteria: The codes used in this value set can be reasonably used to identify patients with acute or chronic Hepatitis B infection.),(Exclusion Criteria: Patients with evidence of current or past acute or chronic Hepatitis B infection.)
